{{Infobox Basketball club | color1 =#FFFFFF | color2 =#336600 | name =Kapfenberg Bulls | nickname = | logo =Bulls-logo.png | imagesize =300px | leagues =[[Ãsterreichische Basketball Bundesliga|Austrian Basketball Bundesliga]] | founded =1976 | history =1976-present | arena =[[Sporthalle Walfersam]] | location =[[Kapfenberg]], [[Austria]] | colors =Green and white | president =Karl Thaller | coach =Michael Schrittwieser | championships = (4) [[Ãsterreichische Basketball Bundesliga|Austrian Championships]]
(1) [[Austrian Basketball Cup]]
(2) [[Austrian Basketball Supercup]] | website = [http://www.kapfenberg-bulls.com www.kapfenberg-bulls.com] | h_body = 01925b | h_pattern_b = _thinsidesonwhite | h_shorts = 01925b | h_pattern_s = _blanksides2 | a_body = 01925b | a_pattern_b = _blackshoulders | a_shorts = 01925b | a_pattern_s = }} '''Kapfenberg Bulls''' is a [[basketball]] club based in [[Kapfenberg]], which is a town in [[Styria]], a [[States of Austria|state]] of [[Austria]]. Since 1991, the team plays in the [[Ãsterreichische Basketball Bundesliga]], the highest Austrian professional basketball league. Between 2001 and 2004, the club had its most successful era with 4 championships in a row. They won their last national title in 2007 ([[Austrian Basketball Cup]]). In 2009, they came in third in the [[Central European Basketball League]], which is the best result of an Austrian basketball team in an international tournament. ==Team Roster 2009-2010== {| border="2" class="wikitable" !
